column5: Franklin Family Ranch is a 2400 acre, family operated, ranch located between San Antonio and Austin. Only 20 minutes from Dripping Springs, the wedding capital of Texas. Our comfortable accommodations and Texas Hill Country charm will leave you with memories you'll have for a lifetime. With Casita South located in the middle of 90 acres, you can relax and enjoy the tranquility of the outdoors with your spouse, family, or group of friends. Casita South can accommodate up to 14 guests.
